history.proof: intros Q x y z Hcan Hredplus Hstar. induction Hstar as [p q Hrp Hirrp]. eapply reducestar0. + eapply reduceplus_trans. * apply cs. * qsimpl time: 1. * qsimpl time: 1. * qsimpl time: 1. * sfirstorder depth: 3. + sfirstorder depth: 3.

ctx: intros Q x y z Hcan Hredplus Hstar.
induction Hstar as [p q Hrp Hirrp].
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) x : list (Term A n) Hcan : canonical A0 eqA ltM x p : list (Term A n) Hredplus : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x p q : list (Term A n) Hrp : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q Hirrp : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q Unable to unify "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q x p" with "OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)".

original: intros Q x y z Hcan Hredplus Hstar. induction Hstar as [p q Hrp Hirrp]. - eapply reducestar0. + eapply reduceplus_trans. * apply cs. * apply Hredplus. * apply Hrp. + apply Hirrp.
